PubModel.TemplateMethods

Class SpecialDrink

  • java.lang.Object
    • PubModel.TemplateMethods.SpecialDrink
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IDrinksStrategy
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CocktailStrategy, LongDrinkStrategy

    public abstract class SpecialDrink
extends java.lang.Object
implements IDrinksStrategy
    An abstract template class for special drinks, e.g. long drinks and cocktails.
